title: Investigation on the relationship between protein and food ratings
description: Cleaned, Analyzed, and used data for creating a multi-class classifier model using a Random Forest Regressor

title: Bike Network Mapping
description: Mapped the bike routes in Boston and Cambridge using d3 and mapbox to create an interactive visualization of traffic in the area

title: Language Models & N-Gram Text Generation
description: Developed an LLM, enabling text generation through sequential word dependencies further developing a markov chain based sentence constructor

title: Test Automation for Agentic AI
description: Used robot framework to automate the manual testing of a company's agentic AI bots

title: Loan Analysis
description: Analyzed a large dataset to uncover trends in loan approvals, utilizing data wrangling, time series analysis, and statistical modeling.

title: Bus Network Navigation
description: Simulated passenger wait times using real bus arrival data analysing descrepancies with theoretical models like the waiting time paradox

title: Visualisation of Price vs. Processing level of High Protein foods
description: Analyzed a dataset of food products sold by three stores Target, Walmart and WHoleFoods to estimate the quality of high protein foods compared to change in price

title: Visualisation: Do developed countries outsource their emissions?
description: Analyzed a large dataset of CO2 emissions based on import and export in order to identify if the null hypothesis could be proven through visualization

title: Image Identification -KNN?
description: Used a KNN algorithm to create an environment that can guess what you are drawing on the screen

title: IoT Project: Domestic Health.
description: Made a domestic health system from scratch, analyzed the data and conducted hyptohesis tests to make conclusions on the data
